product_details.name: PANACHE Cool Tops Eco I R Reflective Cool Roof Coating –Thermal Comfort Without Ac! Cool Top Eco - Cool, Elastomeric & Crack Free Roof Coating 5 Kg Bucket
product_details.description: Cooler Roofs mean longer life of roofs with crack prevention & contribution to indoor cooling. Cool Tops Eco is a single component elastomeric ready to use emulsion with high reflectivity & high emissivity. Cool Top Eco has SRI of 102. It is self-priming and can be applied directly to substrate with brush/roller & spray. Two to three coats of Cool Top Eco gives temperature difference on the substrate exposed to solar radiations. Cool Top Eco amends roof and provides energy conservation with temperature stability. It's being eco-friendly, almost nil VOC adds to environment benefits. Different pastel color shades can also be achieved with reflective pigments.

banner_details:
The banner presents a modern and eco-conscious aesthetic for promoting a thermal roof coating product. The layout is visually balanced, featuring a central product image (`product_image`) of a paint bucket, prominently placed over a dynamic layered background. The top text (`heading`) announces the product's purpose in bold uppercase typography, followed by a supporting description (`subheading`) below it. A circular price badge displays the cost (`price`) in a futuristic font style, adding visual contrast on the right side. At the bottom, the `tagline` highlights core benefits in a clean typographic line, and a teal call-to-action button (`cta_button` with `cta` text) encourages users to shop.

**Color Palette**:
- Light Cyan (#E0F7FA)
- Teal (#00897B)
- Dark Teal (#00695C)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Accent Green (#8BC34A)
- Deep Aqua (#00796B)
- Aqua Blue (#4DB6AC)
- Button Teal (#009688)
product_color: The product image uses a clean and refreshing color palette that communicates eco-friendliness and cooling efficiency. A dominant teal green (#009688) covers the lower half of the container, evoking freshness, calm, and environmental consciousness. The white background (#FFFFFF) enhances purity and cleanliness while offering strong contrast to the teal for improved readability. The navy blue (#0D254D) used for the “Panache” branding adds a professional and trustworthy tone. A pop of lime green (#A4C639) in the logo emphasizes sustainability. These colors blend smoothly with crisp separation, ensuring vital elements are both highlighted and aesthetically unified — ideal for an eye-catching advertisement banner.
